df.enum = {
    ---框架内部消息类型
    ---@type df_message_type
    message_type = require 'framework/message/message_type',

    ---连接状态类型
    ---@type connection_status
    connection_status = require 'framework/network/model/connection_status',

    ---Record事件类型
    ---@type record_event_type
    record_event_type = require 'framework/network/model/record_event_type',

    ---Record事件类型
    ---@type language_type
    language_type = require 'framework/localization/model/language_type',

    ---场景状态
    ---@type scene_status
    scene_status = require 'framework/scene/model/scene_status',

    ---场景类型
    ---@type scene_type
    scene_type = require 'framework/scene/model/scene_type',

    ---窗体状态
    ---@type window_status
    window_status = require 'framework/window/model/window_status',

    ---窗体类型
    ---@type window_type
    window_type = require 'framework/window/model/window_type',

    ---资源类型
    ---@type asset_type
    asset_type = require 'framework/res/model/asset_type',

    ---音频类型 
    ---@type audio_type
    audio_type = require 'framework/audio/audio_type',

    ---平台类型 
    ---@type platform_type
    platform_type = require 'framework/game/platform_type',
}
